name: easorms
description: Easorms is a ORM for postgresql, it's easy to use and has a lot of features.
author: Lempereur Corentin <73390812+aredli16@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.dev: yarn stop && docker compose up -d database keycloak discovery gateway registration && yarn workspace front dev
scripts.build: cd back && chmod 777 mvnw && ./mvnw clean install && cd .. && yarn workspace front build
